description.value: At 12th level, whenever an ally is within reach of the summoner's eidolon, the ally gains a +2 shield bonus to its Armor Class and a +2 circumstance bonus on its saving throws. If this ally is the summoner, these bonuses increase to +4. This bonus does not apply if the eidolon is @Compendium[pf1.conditions.zemoWcP2SR6FTiS1]{grappled}, @Compendium[pf1.conditions.g84rPrlfDnkUopAa]{helpless}, @Compendium[pf1.conditions.8zG4yDD2zGVSAJFH]{paralyzed}, @Compendium[pf1.conditions.assqfdN6G1URo9MZ]{stunned}, or @Compendium[pf1.conditions.bj36eCfZGJG5AGTQ]{unconscious}.
